Headlines: A Review of Year-End Reviews: The Canada Letter
Snippets: This week’s newsletter about Canada and for Canadians picks highlights from The Times’s year-end reviews and lists.

Headlines: Putting Australia in Its Place, Vanishing Ice: Canada Today
Snippets: This week’s Canada Letter asks Canadian readers to take on their Australian counterparts in a challenge.

Headlines: The Land of Apology and a Return to Montreal: The Canada Letter
Snippets: This week’s newsletter about Canada and for Canadians looks into Canadians’ tendency to say sorry and welcomes an expat home.

Headlines: The Halifax Explosion and Au Revoir to Hi: The Canada Letter
Snippets: This week’s Canada Letter looks at a film about the deaf community in Halifax when the city was hit by a massive explosion a century ago

Headlines: A Return to Haiti, and Broadway via Edmonton: The Canada Letter
Snippets: Our Toronto bureau chief talks about her searing experiences in Haiti, and Broadway producers find a congenial tryout spot in Edmonton.

Snippets: In this week’s newsletter for about Canadians, our readers offer their thoughts on how the public health care system has come to define the country.

Headlines: Bernie Sanders, Health Care and Hydro: The Canada Letter
Snippets: The Canada Letter, the newsletter for and about Canadians, looks at Bernie Sanders on Canada’s health system, and a blow to a British Columbia megaproject.

Headlines: Canada Letter: Catalonia Is a Reminder of Not Just Quebec
Snippets: This week’s Canada Letter looks at the pension shortfall at Sears Canada and, with Catalonia in the news, contemplates separation anxiety at home.

Headlines: Canada Letter: The End of a Ritual and a Daring Hostage Rescue
Snippets: This week’s letter looks at the death of Sears and, with it, the end of mail-order catalog shopping. We also look at the dramatic rescue of a Canadian-American family.

Snippets: This week’s Canada Letter looks at the battle over ads for legal marijuana, a tribute to Leonard Cohen a year after his death, and Canadian filmmakers in North Korea.
